summary: Buddy Hackett  was an American actor and comedian.
full_text: Buddy Hackett  was an American comedian and actor. His best remembered roles include Marcellus Washburn in The Music Man , Benjy Benjamin in It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World , Tennessee Steinmetz in The Love Bug , and Scuttle in The Little Mermaid .
title: Buddy Hackett
